item.title: A safety institute advised against releasing an early version of Anthropic’s Claude Opus 4 AI model
item.description: A third-party research institute that Anthropic partnered with to test one of its new flagship AI models, Claude Opus 4, recommended against deploying...

item.title: AI Is Eating Data Center Power Demand—and It’s Only Getting Worse
item.description: A new analysis of AI hardware being produced and how it is being used attempts to estimate the vast amount of electricity being consumed by AI.

item.title: Microsoft says Lumma password stealer malware found on 394,000 Windows PCs
item.description: Microsoft and law enforcement announced a coordinated takedown of the Lumma pasword-stealing malware.

item.title: Mozilla is shutting down read-it-later app Pocket
